unnormalised: Ayurveda, eh? Always interesting! My Dadi swears by it for everything. She went to a clinic in Kerala back in '03 and still talks about it. Says the Shirodhara at 11:00 am was life-changing! I've tried some herbal remedies. Turmeric milk for colds is a must, since childhood! Anyone tried the treatments at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala? Thinking of going around Diwali, 2024. Need to rejuvenate after all the festive chaos! Heard it's pricey now, around Rs. 5000 a day, maybe?
normalised: Ayurveda, eh? Always interesting! My Dadi swears by it for everything. She went to a clinic in Kerala back in two thousand and three and still talks about it. Says the Shirodhara at eleven am was life-changing! I've tried some herbal remedies. Turmeric milk for colds is a must, since childhood! Anyone tried the treatments at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala? Thinking of going around Diwali, two thousand and twenty four. Need to rejuvenate after all the festive chaos! Heard it's pricey now, around rupee five thousand a day, maybe?
